Elements and Tags

This will be an explination regarding elements and tags.

All elements have open and close <> with either a p for paragraph.

The closing tag of an element consist of a <.../>

If it were a heading the element would look like this have an opening tag <> and a closing tag h1/>

Void Elements

Void elements do not have a closing tag

    Elements that are considered void elements
  • br
  • image
